title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Serious Game-Based Teacher Training for Collaborative Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Concepts of Collaborative Learning and Experience in Designing Science Curriculum
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can design collaborative science learning plans using the 4Ts (Task, Timing, Technology, Team) framework
Learners can review consistency and improve collaborative learning scenarios through digital/hybrid game tools
Learners can evaluate the practical applicability of learning activity designs by exchanging real-time feedback with peer teachers

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
